  cats %>% 
  mutate(., Over2.5 = ifelse(Bwt > 2.5, T, F)) %>% 
  group_by(Sex) %>% 
  count(Over2.5) %>% 
  spread(., key = Over2.5, value = n) %>% 
  mutate(., Proportion = `TRUE` / sum(`TRUE`, `FALSE`))

## Normal Distribution
```{r}
set.seed(10)

obs <- 
  rnorm(10000) %>% 
  as_tibble(.)


ggplot(obs) + 
  geom_histogram(aes(x=value,y=..density..), position="identity") + 
  geom_density(aes(x=value,y=..density..))

clt <- vector("double", 2000)

for (i in 1:2000) {
clt[[i]] <- 
  obs %>%
  sample_n(10, replace = TRUE) %>% 
  summarise(mean = mean(value)) %>% 
  as.numeric()
}

clt <- 
  clt %>% as.tibble(.)
  
ggplot(clt) + 
  geom_histogram(aes(x=value,y=..density..), position="identity") + 
  geom_density(aes(x=value,y=..density..))

```


```{r}
set.seed(10)
distributions <- 
  tribble(
    ~f, ~params,
    "rnorm", list(n = 10000),
    "rexp", list(n = 10000),
    "rbinom", list( n = 10000, size = 1, p = 0.1)
    )

distributions <- 
  distributions %>% 
  mutate(distr = invoke_map(f, params))

sampling <- function(df, n) {
  result <- vector("double", 2000)
  for(i in 1:2000) {
    result[[i]] <- 
      df %>%
      sample(n, replace = T) %>% 
      mean
  }
  return(result)
}


distributions <- 
distributions %>% 
  mutate(samp3 = map(.$distr, sampling, 3),
         samp10 = map(.$distr, sampling, 10),
         samp100 = map(.$distr, sampling, 100)
  ) 


df <- 
  distributions %>% 
  .$samp3 %>% 
  as.data.frame()

names(df) <- c("rnorm","rexp","rbinom")

df <- gather(df)
df$n <- 3

df1 <- 
  distributions %>% 
  .$samp10 %>% 
  as.data.frame()

names(df1) <- c("rnorm","rexp","rbinom")
df1 <- gather(df1)
df1$n <- 10

df <- bind_rows(df,df1)

df1 <- 
  distributions %>% 
  .$samp100 %>% 
  as.data.frame()

names(df1) <- c("rnorm","rexp","rbinom")
df1 <- gather(df1)
df1$n <- 100

df <- bind_rows(df,df1)


df %>% 
  filter(key=="rnorm") %>% 
ggplot() + 
geom_histogram(aes(x=value,y=..density..), position="identity") + 
geom_density(aes(x=value,y=..density..)) +
facet_grid(.~n)


df %>% 
  filter(key=="rexp") %>% 
ggplot() + 
geom_histogram(aes(x=value,y=..density..), position="identity") + 
geom_density(aes(x=value,y=..density..)) +
facet_grid(.~n)

df %>% 
  filter(key=="rbinom") %>% 
ggplot() + 
geom_histogram(aes(x=value,y=..density..), position="identity") + 
geom_density(aes(x=value,y=..density..)) +
facet_grid(.~n)

```
